text: is a Japanese ceramist. He was named a Living National Treasure in 1994. He comes from Toki, Gifu. == References == == External links == * https://web.archive.org/web/20170205013817/http://exhibition.ceramics.ntpc.gov.tw/celadon/en/a_products_03.html * http://yakimono- gallery.art.coocan.jp/2011_koten/2011_suzuki_osamu_matsuzakaya.htm * http://www.nihonkogeikai.or.jp/work/3201 Category:1934 births Category:Japanese ceramists Category:Living National Treasures of Japan Category:Artists from Gifu Prefecture Category:Living people Category:Date of birth missing (living people)
title: Osamu Suzuki (ceramist)
